description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Local Security Authority (LSA) Server Information Disclosure Vulnerability (CVE-2024-38122):

1. Download and install the relevant update for your operating system version from the Microsoft Update Catalog.

   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2 (x64): [KB5041571](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041571)
   - For Windows 10 (x64): [KB5041782](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041782)
   - For additional Windows versions, refer to the corresponding KB articles.

2. Ensure all systems are restarted after installation to apply the updates fully.

**Details**:
- This update mitigates an essential information disclosure vulnerability by initializing resources properly within the LSA.
- Affected builds include various versions of Windows 10 and Windows 11 as specified.
- Always backup critical data before proceeding with system updates.
